title: aka 'The Blair Bitch Project'
review: before renting this, the other half and I had jokingly referred to the movie as 'the blair Bitch project'.  Imagine our surprise, only a little way into the movie, to find that we'd tagged the director of the project correctly... by the time we were three/fourths of the way through the disc, we were rooting for the ghost.don't waste your money
